text: ql -ayha alrswl- lhwla' almshrkyn: lilah alshafaeat jmyeana, lah mulk alsmwat wal'ard wama fyhma, falamr kulah lilah whdh, wala yashfae ahd eindah 'iilaa b'idhnh, fahu aldhy yamlik alsmwat wal'ard wayatasaraf fyhma, falwajb 'an tutlb alshafaeat mmn ymlkha, wa'ana tukhls lah alebadt, wala tutlb min hadhih alalihat alty la tadura wala tnfe, thuma 'iilayh turjaewn baed mmatkm llhsab waljza'
